channel.title: ZodiacsReign 8.0 : "The Ultimate RSPS Package"
channel.description:
[ul][list][list][list][list][center][Img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2u6mw02.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][i]What is ZodiacsReign?[/i] [b][font=Verdana]ZodiacsReign is a RSPS helper containing mostly required programs and files to make your RSPS coding and playing more proficient and easy, Zodiacsreign has been around for almost 2 years and I've been updating for a very long time. In "ZodiacsReign Packages" you will find Tools, Id List , Essentials to make your private server experience a better one.[/b][/center] [color=maroon] [center][b][i] [color=blue]In the new ZodiacsReign 8.0, I've added alot more tools and a few more list to help you out, This is i have to admit not a great one like the past ones.[/b][/center]
[Center][size=20pt]Download Link~[/size] http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zemggxwtyn1 [b]4.55mb[/b] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/free-file-hosting/mediafire-swoosh.gif[/img] [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2ztikh0.jpg[/img][/center]
[Center][i][size=11pt][b]Features[/b][/center] [center] [b][size=12pt]317 List[/b] [list] [color=orange][list][li]317 Item List[/li][/list] [list][li]317 NPC List[/li] [li]317 Interface List[/li] [li]317 Graphics List[/li] [li]317 Object List[/li] [li]317 Emote List [/li] [li]317 Coordinate List [/li] [li]317 Animation List [/li] [li]And More[/li][/list][/list]
[b][size=12pt][color=green]508 List[/b] [list][li]508 Interface List[/li] [li]508 NPC List [/li] [li]508 Object List[/li] [li]508 Item List[/li] [li]508 Graphics List[/li] [li]508 Hair & Clothes Color List[/li] [li]508 Emotes List[/li] [li]508 Sounds List [/li][/list]
[b][size=12pt][color=blue]Tools[/b] [list][li]Eleclions Server Rebooter[/li] [li]Meiscooldudes Shopmaker & Server Runetime Manager[/li] [li]Hypercam Set-Up[/li] [li]Basic Command Generator[/li] [li]Voule's Auto-Restarter[/li] [li]Voule's Command Generator [/li] [li]Voule's Auto-spawn Generator[/li] [li]Backup Tool[/li] [li]Character Editor[/li] [li]Runescape Windows Client[/li] [li]WinterLove Server[/li] [li]Brand new Shop-Maker[/li] [li]Sprite-Maker[/li] [li]Moparscape Client[/li] [li]Server Item Clearer[/li] [li]525 Item List[/li] [li]Auto-typer & Auto-clicker[/li] [li]And More[/li] [li]More tools then before![/li] [/list]
[b][size=14pt]Picture[/size][/b] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2czoiz9.jpg[/img][/center]
[Center]
[size=12pt][b]Virus Scan(s)[/b][/size] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/20jfdhs.jpg[/img] [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/331hyf6.png[/img]
[size=19pt]Credits[/size] [b][size=8pt] Pur3z-Scape Staff Cocoa Hidendra The Soul Galkon Jagex LTD SilabSoft Jeremy Yak Voule Meiscooldudes GalkonsPride Community BytyIsle Community Moparscape Community RuneLimited Community A Censored Community Pur3z-Scape Community PloxageScape Community[/size][/b] [Img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2u6mw02.png[/img][center]
[center][i]ZodiacsReign 8.0 was made by Z 0 D I A C[/i][/center]
[color=white][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: ZodiacsReign 8.0 : "The Ultimate RSPS Package"
item.dc:creator: @Z_0_D_I_A_C Z 0 D I A C
item.description:
@Z_0_D_I_A_C wrote:

[quote=“josh225, post:13, topic:307676”]looks great but there is only one problem i can spot…
[size=12pt]Virus Scan(s)[/size]

and that is that on the virus scans if you look it says total itms scanned: 1 where when i have done virus scans on servers it shows that its scanned about a hundred items.

331hyf6.png750×555

then again on the above virus scan total items scanned: 1 and total files scanned: 1 and in the other pics u can see that there is more than just 1 file.
this is a scan i made of one of my servers and as you can see there should be more than just one item scanned.
258qqzb.jpg838×595
[/quote]

I scanned it when it was unzipped.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2009, 10:05:02 pm[/size][hr][quote=“King Lingerz, post:10, topic:307676”][quote author=Z 0 D I A C link=topic=403829.msg2989603#msg2989603 date=1255219699]
You can trace ZodiacsReign back to before you even joined this community.
Could it that you took it out of one of my older packs and put your name on it?
[/quote]

No, it could not. You seem to be mistaking me for someone who posts work with sufficiently crediting the creators, similar to what you’ve done here.

I created them both from scratch and released them in a pack on both MoparScape and R-S a few months ago.[/quote]

“Few months ago”
ZodiacsReign 508 list(s) have existed since last year.

Read full topic
